doc:
Jessica Harper https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jessica_Harper 0 Jessica Harper (born October 10, 1949) is an American actress, producer, and singer. Harper began her feature film career with a starring role in Brian De Palma's Phantom of the Paradise (1974) as well as a role in Inserts (1975). She is best known for her portrayal of Suzy Bannion, the protagonist of Dario Argento's giallo cult classic Suspiria (1977), and appeared in a supporting role in Luca Guadagnino's 2018 remake. Her other films include Stardust Memories (1980), Shock Treatment (1981) (the followup to The Rocky Horror Picture Show in which she replaced Susan Sarandon as Janet Weiss), The Blue Iguana (1988), Safe (1995), and Minority Report (2002). In addition to acting, Harper is also an author of children's music and books. Jessica_Harper ( born October_10_,_1949 ) is an_American_actress , producer , and singer . Harper began her_feature_film_career with a_starring_role in Brian_De_Palma 's_Phantom of the_Paradise_(_1974 ) as_well_as a_role in Inserts ( 1975_) . She is_best_known for her_portrayal of Suzy_Bannion , the_protagonist of Dario_Argento 's_giallo_cult classic_Suspiria_(_1977_) , and appeared in a_supporting_role in Luca_Guadagnino 's_2018_remake . Her_other_films include Stardust_Memories_(_1980_)_,_Shock_Treatment ( 1981 ) ( the_followup to The_Rocky_Horror_Picture_Show in which she replaced Susan_Sarandon as Janet_Weiss_) , The_Blue_Iguana_(_1988_) , Safe_(_1995_) , and Minority_Report ( 2002_) . In addition to acting , Harper is also an_author of children 's_music_and_books .
